/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings flank the street on both sides, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. Trees line the street, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds dotting the horizon.
